response.original_title: Killer Doctor: The Harold Shipman Case
response.overview: Documentary following the harrowing Crimes of Harold Fredrick Shipman. Known as 'doctor death', Shipman was a general practitioner operating in Hyde, greater Manchester. From police negligence, to manipultion, Shipman was able to murder over 200 victims, hiding under a soft, caring demeanor. This film includes exclusive interviews from professionals who seek to explore Shipman's motivations and actions, which remain a stain of the British medical industry.
response.title: Killer Doctor: The Harold Shipman Case
